Burning Snake Ring.NAME: Ring of the Burning Snake
Burning Snake Ring.FLAVOR: Made from a fossilized snake, that was set on fire. Why would anyone do that?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, draw an additional card. At the end of combat, heal #b

Blackend Snake Ring.NAME: Charred Snake Ring
Blackend Snake Ring.FLAVOR: A snake ring that has been deep fried, making it extra tasty.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #gRing #gof #gthe #Burning #gSnake. At the start of each combat, draw #b
additional card. At the end of combat, heal #b
